actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the volunteer activities of the Friends of Lubavitch organization.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Friends of Lubavitch and its volunteers should be congratulated for reminding us of the need to remain ever vigilant against spiritual oppression, honored for elevating the standards and morality of all people, and wished continued success.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the volunteer activities of the Friends of Lubavitch organization.
